field.name: summary
field.value: A comment on the last line of the file causes a parser error

field.name: description
field.value:
If the last last line of the NVelocity view file is a comment then the parser will throw an exception. To reproduce this make sure there isn't a empty line after your comment.
Exception Details: NVelocity.Runtime.Parser.ParseException: Lexical error: NVelocity.Runtime.Parser.TokenMgrError: Lexical error at line 113, column 48. Encountered: <EOF> after : "" at NVelocity.Runtime.Parser.ParserTokenManager.get_NextToken() at NVelocity.Runtime.Parser.Parser.jj_ntk() at NVelocity.Runtime.Parser.Parser.Process() at NVelocity.Runtime.Parser.Parser.Parse(TextReader reader, String templateName)
